description: Amtagvi is intended to help patients with melanoma that cannot be removed with surgery or has spread to other parts of the body.
title: FDA approves first cell therapy to treat aggressive forms of melanoma

description: Charles McGonigal, a former high-ranking FBI counterintelligence official, was sentenced for taking hundreds of thousands of dollars in cash from a businessman with ties to the Albanian government.
title: Ex-FBI official gets over 2 years in prison for receiving $225,000 tied to Albania

description: Ukraine aid is stalled in the U.S. House of Representatives. Vice President Harris said there's no other option for helping Ukraine push back against Russia's invasion.
title: Harris says 'there is only Plan A' for Ukraine aid. Zelenskyy says he's counting on it

description: Alexei Navalny's spokesperson confirmed Saturday that the Russian opposition leader had died at a remote Arctic penal colony and said he was "murdered," but it is unclear where his body is.
title: Alexei Navalny's team confirms his death. His mother is searching for his body

description: About half those injured in the Kansas City Super Bowl parade shooting were children. With such incidents continuing to happen, some parents now think twice about bringing kids to big, crowded events.
title: In wake of mass shootings, some parents hesitate bringing their kids to big events

description: As Americans struggle to find affordable housing, cities are realizing their own rules have made it too hard and expensive to build the homes they need. Now, some cities are trying to change that.
title: The hottest trend in U.S. cities? Changing zoning rules to allow more housing

description: Israel is recruiting skilled laborers from India after suspending work permits for most Palestinian workers following the Oct. 7 attack on Israel by Hamas-backed militants.
title: With Palestinian laborers shut out of Israel, Indian workers line up for jobs there

description: Republican presidential hopeful Nikki Haley has recently been directing attacks at Vice President Kamala Harris as she highlights concerns about President Biden's age.
title: Nikki Haley's latest target on the campaign trail? Kamala Harris

description: Lawmakers grilled the head of the VA home loan program this week about a self-inflicted error with the department's COVID forbearance program that left thousands of veterans in danger of foreclosure.
title: Thousands of vets fell victim to a bait-and-switch...by the VA? Lawmakers want a fix

description: The United Auto Workers union said Friday that nearly 9,000 workers at the Kentucky Truck Plant in Louisville will strike on Feb. 23 if a local contract dispute is not resolved.
title: Autoworkers threaten to strike again at Ford's huge Kentucky truck plant

description: In a short statement posted on Facebook early Saturday, a Ukrainian commander said he had made the decision to avoid encirclement by Russian forces and "preserve the lives and health of servicemen."
title: Ukraine withdrawing from Avdiivka, where outnumbered defenders held out for 4 months

description: An explosion in a Washington, D.C., suburb leveled a home where firefighters were investigating a gas leak. One firefighter was killed and nine other firefighters injured. Two civilians were injured.
title: An explosion at a Virginia home kills 1 firefighter and injures 11
